page.title: 17Hobbies and interests.
page.content: My pony goes out into the field about 10.30am.My Mum puts him out because I'm at school.When I get home from school I change into my riding clothes.Then go out and catch him and bring him in for grooming.For grooming I use a body brush and a hoof pick.After I've finised grooming him I get him ready for riding by getting my saddle and bridle.And I get my skull cap as well. A skull cap is different than a riding hat and safer. Now I'm ready for a ride.I normally go with my Mum or Dad because my Mum does not think its safe on my own.When we get back I untack and give him a dish of horse and pony nuts.I can't give him oats because it makes him frisky.
